channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12574] Update replication metrics to not do so many map look ups.
item.description: Replication is the last metrics area that still does a significant amount of hash map lookups. Lets re-factor that.
item.summary: Update replication metrics to not do so many map look ups.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12685207/HBASE-12574.patch
against master branch at commit 08754f2c431b829b0d6269bdb23284dd679ed8ca.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12685207

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 4 new or modified tests.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

-1 checkstyle. The applied patch generated 2074 checkstyle errors (more than the master's current 2072 errors).

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

-1 release audit. The applied patch generated 1 release audit warnings (more than the master's current 0 warnings).

-1 lineLengths. The patch introduces the following lines longer than 100:
+ ageOfLastShippedOpGauge = rms.getMetricsRegistry().getLongGauge(SOURCE_AGE_OF_LAST_SHIPPED_OP, 0L);
+ logEditsFilteredCounter = rms.getMetricsRegistry().getLongCounter(SOURCE_LOG_EDITS_FILTERED, 0L);
+ globalSourceSource = CompatibilitySingletonFactory.getInstance(MetricsReplicationSourceFactory.class).getGlobalSource();

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

-1 core zombie tests. There are 1 zombie test(s): at org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.TestCodec.testGzipLongOverflow(TestCodec.java:830)

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/11938//testReport/
Release audit warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/11938//artifact/patchprocess/patchReleaseAuditWarnings.txt
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/11938//artifact/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-examples.html

Enis Soztutar you ok with me pulling this into branch-1.0? HBASE-12658 is pulling this into 0.98 and it would be weird to have a discontinuity.
We could do branch-1.0 of course. But upgrade from 0.98 to something in 1.1 doesn't present a discontinuity against branch-1.
Sorry my +1 above stood for branch-1.0 as well. Is this pushed to branch-1 as well as branch-1.0?
yeah my bad. This was in before the rc branch was cut.
